#labels Featured
Instructions on how you can build the lastest trunk-version of VocableCoach:

= Requirements =

 * Compiler (tested only with g++)
 * [http://trolltech.com/developer/downloads/qt Qt 4.3] (perhaps an ealier version will work) installed in your path
 * [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion] (to checkout latest development version)

= Details =

 * {{{svn co http://vocablecoach.googlecode.com/svn/trunk vocablecoach}}}
 * {{{cd vocablecoach}}}
 * {{{qmake}}}
 * {{{make}}}
 * {{{./vocablecoach}}}
